mapper.select:
SELECT o.CAR_NO, o.EXPENSE, o.ELECTRIC_CHARGE, o.CARD_NO, o.STATION_NAME, o.DEV_NAME, o.CHARGE_BEGIN, o.CHARGE_END, o.BALANCE_, o.COMPANY_ID, o.STATUS_ FROM t_ev_order o
and o.STATUS_='3'
and DATE_FORMAT(o.CHARGE_BEGIN,'%Y%m%d%H%i%s') >=DATE_FORMAT(#{startTime},'%Y%m%d%H%i%s')
and DATE_FORMAT(o.CHARGE_END,'%Y%m%d%H%i%s') <=DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime},'%Y%m%d%H%i%s')
and o.STATION_NAME=#{stationName}
and (o.CARD_NO LIKE '%${cardNo}%' or o.DEV_NAME LIKE '%${cardNo}%')
and o.COMPANY_ID=#{companyId}
order by o.CHARGE_BEGIN

select o.CAR_NO, o.card_no, o.charge_begin, o.COMPANY_ID, DATE_FORMAT(o.CHARGE_BEGIN,'%Y-%m') months, ROUND(SUM(IFNULL(o.ELECTRIC_CHARGE_J,0.00)),2) charge_J, ROUND(SUM(IFNULL(o.ELECTRIC_CHARGE_F,0.00)),2) charge_F, ROUND(SUM(IFNULL(o.ELECTRIC_CHARGE_P,0.00)),2) charge_P, ROUND(SUM(IFNULL(o.ELECTRIC_CHARGE_G,0.00)),2) charge_G, ROUND(SUM(IFNULL(o.ELECTRIC_CHARGE,0.00)),2) total_charge, -- ROUND(SUM(IFNULL(o.EXPENSE_J,0.00)),2) expense_J, ROUND(SUM(IFNULL(o.EXPENSE_F,0.00)),2) expense_F, ROUND(SUM(IFNULL(o.EXPENSE_P,0.00)),2) expense_P, ROUND(SUM(IFNULL(o.EXPENSE_G,0.00)),2) expense_G, ROUND(SUM(IFNULL(o.EXPENSE,0.00)),2) total_expense FROM t_ev_order o
AND o.COMPANY_ID=#{companyId} -- 默认状态等于3 AND o.STATUS_='3'
and DATE_FORMAT(#{dateTime},'%Y%m%')=DATE_FORMAT(o.CHARGE_BEGIN,'%Y%m%') and DATE_FORMAT(#{dateTime},'%Y%m%d%') < DATE_FORMAT(o.CHARGE_BEGIN,'%Y%m%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(o.CHARGE_BEGIN,'%Y%m%')=DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y%m%')
-- group by o.car_no

select o.CAR_NO, o.card_no, o.charge_begin, o.COMPANY_ID, DATE_FORMAT(o.CHARGE_BEGIN,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') days, ROUND(SUM(IFNULL(o.ELECTRIC_CHARGE_J,0.00)),2) charge_J, ROUND(SUM(IFNULL(o.ELECTRIC_CHARGE_F,0.00)),2) charge_F, ROUND(SUM(IFNULL(o.ELECTRIC_CHARGE_P,0.00)),2) charge_P, ROUND(SUM(IFNULL(o.ELECTRIC_CHARGE_G,0.00)),2) charge_G, ROUND(SUM(IFNULL(o.ELECTRIC_CHARGE,0.00)),2) total_charge, -- ROUND(SUM(IFNULL(o.EXPENSE_J,0.00)),2) expense_J, ROUND(SUM(IFNULL(o.EXPENSE_F,0.00)),2) expense_F, ROUND(SUM(IFNULL(o.EXPENSE_P,0.00)),2) expense_P, ROUND(SUM(IFNULL(o.EXPENSE_G,0.00)),2) expense_G, ROUND(SUM(IFNULL(o.EXPENSE,0.00)),2) total_expense FROM t_ev_order o
AND o.STATUS_='3'
AND DATE_FORMAT(#{dateTime},'%Y%m%d%') = DATE_FORMAT(o.CHARGE_BEGIN,'%Y%m%d%') AND DATE_FORMAT(#{dateTime},'%Y%m%d%H%i%s') < DATE_FORMAT(o.CHARGE_BEGIN,'%Y%m%d%H%i%s')
And DATE_FORMAT(o.CHARGE_BEGIN,'%Y-%m-%d')=DATE_SUB(CURDATE(),INTERVAL 1 DAY)
AND o.COMPANY_ID=#{companyId}
group by o.car_no

select o.station_name, o.charge_begin, o.COMPANY_ID, DATE_FORMAT(o.charge_begin,'%Y-%m-%d') days, DATE_FORMAT(o.charge_begin,'%Y-%m') months, ROUND(SUM(IFNULL(o.ELECTRIC_CHARGE,0.00)),2) total_charge FROM t_ev_order o
AND o.STATUS_='3'
and DATE_FORMAT(#{dateTime},'%Y%m%')=DATE_FORMAT(o.CHARGE_BEGIN,'%Y%m%') and DATE_FORMAT(#{dateTime},'%Y%m%d%') <= DATE_FORMAT(o.CHARGE_BEGIN,'%Y%m%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(o.charge_begin,'%Y%m')=DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y%m')
and o.COMPANY_ID=#{companyId}
group by days,O.STATION_NAME WITH ROLLUP
